verses.text_ar: حمٓ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Ha. Mim.

verses.text_ar: وَٱلْكِتَـٰبِ ٱلْمُبِينِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: By the Scripture that maketh plain

verses.text_ar: إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ فِى لَيْلَةٍ مُّبَـٰرَكَةٍ ۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُنذِرِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! We revealed it on a blessed night - Lo! We are ever warning -

verses.text_ar: فِيهَا يُفْرَقُ كُلُّ أَمْرٍ حَكِيمٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Whereon every wise command is made clear

verses.text_ar: أَمْرًا مِّنْ عِندِنَآ ۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُرْسِلِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: As a command from Our presence - Lo! We are ever sending -

verses.text_ar: رَحْمَةً مِّن رَّبِّكَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
verses.text_en_pickthall: A mercy from thy Lord. Lo! He, even He is the Hearer, the Knower,

verses.text_ar: رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ ۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lord of the heavens and the earth and all that is between them, if ye would be sure.

verses.text_ar: لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ يُحْىِۦ وَيُمِيتُ ۖ رَبُّكُمْ وَرَبُّ ءَابَآئِكُمُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: There is no Allah save Him. He quickeneth and giveth death; your Lord and Lord of your forefathers.

verses.text_ar: بَلْ هُمْ فِى شَكٍّ يَلْعَبُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Nay, but they play in doubt.

verses.text_ar: فَٱرْتَقِبْ يَوْمَ تَأْتِى ٱلسَّمَآءُ بِدُخَانٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: But watch thou (O Muhammad) for the day when the sky will produce visible smoke

verses.text_ar: يَغْشَى ٱلنَّاسَ ۖ هَـٰذَا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: That will envelop the people. This will be a painful torment.

verses.text_ar: رَّبَّنَا ٱكْشِفْ عَنَّا ٱلْعَذَابَ إِنَّا مُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: (Then they will say): Our Lord relieve us of the torment. Lo! we are believers.

verses.text_ar: أَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ وَقَدْ جَآءَهُمْ رَسُولٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: How can there be remembrance for them, when a messenger making plain (the Truth) had already come unto them,

verses.text_ar: ثُمَّ تَوَلَّوْا۟ عَنْهُ وَقَالُوا۟ مُعَلَّمٌ مَّجْنُونٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And they had turned away from him and said: One taught (by others), a madman?

verses.text_ar: إِنَّا كَاشِفُوا۟ ٱلْعَذَابِ قَلِيلًا ۚ إِنَّكُمْ عَآئِدُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! We withdraw the torment a little. Lo! ye return (to disbelief).

verses.text_ar: يَوْمَ نَبْطِشُ ٱلْبَطْشَةَ ٱلْكُبْرَىٰٓ إِنَّا مُنتَقِمُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: On the day when We shall seize them with the greater seizure, (then) in truth We shall punish.

verses.text_ar: ۞ وَلَقَدْ فَتَنَّا قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمَ فِرْعَوْنَ وَجَآءَهُمْ رَسُولٌ كَرِيمٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And verily We tried before them Pharaoh´s folk, when there came unto them a noble messenger,

verses.text_ar: أَنْ أَدُّوٓا۟ إِلَىَّ عِبَادَ ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّى لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Saying: Give up to me the slaves of Allah. Lo! I am a faithful messenger unto you.

verses.text_ar: وَأَن لَّا تَعْلُوا۟ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّىٓ ءَاتِيكُم بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And saying: Be not proud against Allah. Lo! I bring you a clear warrant.

verses.text_ar: وَإِنِّى عُذْتُ بِرَبِّى وَرَبِّكُمْ أَن تَرْجُمُونِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And lo! I have sought refuge in my Lord and your Lord lest ye stone me to death.

verses.text_ar: وَإِن لَّمْ تُؤْمِنُوا۟ لِى فَٱعْتَزِلُونِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And if ye put no faith in me, then let me go.

verses.text_ar: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوْمٌ مُّجْرِمُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And he cried unto his Lord, (saying): These are guilty folk.

verses.text_ar: فَأَسْرِ بِعِبَادِى لَيْلًا إِنَّكُم مُّتَّبَعُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Then (his Lord commanded): Take away My slaves by night. Lo! ye will be followed,

verses.text_ar: وَٱتْرُكِ ٱلْبَحْرَ رَهْوًا ۖ إِنَّهُمْ جُندٌ مُّغْرَقُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And leave the sea behind at rest, for lo! they are a drowned host.

verses.text_ar: كَمْ تَرَكُوا۟ مِن جَنَّـٰتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: How many were the gardens and the watersprings that they left behind,

verses.text_ar: وَزُرُوعٍ وَمَقَامٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And the cornlands and the goodly sites

verses.text_ar: وَنَعْمَةٍ كَانُوا۟ فِيهَا فَـٰكِهِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And pleasant things wherein they took delight!

verses.text_ar: كَذَٰلِكَ ۖ وَأَوْرَثْنَـٰهَا قَوْمًا ءَاخَرِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Even so (it was), and We made it an inheritance for other folk;

verses.text_ar: فَمَا بَكَتْ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ وَٱلْأَرْضُ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ مُنظَرِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And the heaven and the earth wept not for them, nor were they reprieved.

verses.text_ar: وَلَقَدْ نَجَّيْنَا بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ مِنَ ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلْمُهِينِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And We delivered the Children of Israel from the shameful doom;

verses.text_ar: مِن فِرْعَوْنَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَالِيًا مِّنَ ٱلْمُسْرِفِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: (We delivered them) from Pharaoh. Lo! he was a tyrant of the wanton ones.

verses.text_ar: وَلَقَدِ ٱخْتَرْنَـٰهُمْ عَلَىٰ عِلْمٍ عَلَى ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And We chose them, purposely, above (all) creatures.

verses.text_ar: وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُم مِّنَ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ مَا فِيهِ بَلَـٰٓؤٌا۟ مُّبِينٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And We gave them portents wherein was a clear trial.

verses.text_ar: إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَيَقُولُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! these, forsooth, are saying:

verses.text_ar: إِنْ هِىَ إِلَّا مَوْتَتُنَا ٱلْأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُنشَرِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: There is naught but our first death, and we shall not be raised again.

verses.text_ar: فَأْتُوا۟ بِـَٔابَآئِنَآ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Bring back our fathers, if ye speak the truth!

verses.text_ar: أَهُمْ خَيْرٌ أَمْ قَوْمُ تُبَّعٍ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ أَهْلَكْنَـٰهُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ مُجْرِمِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Are they better, or the folk of Tubb´a and those before them? We destroyed them, for surely they were guilty.

verses.text_ar: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا لَـٰعِبِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And We created not the heavens and the earth, and all that is between them, in play.

verses.text_ar: مَا خَلَقْنَـٰهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: We created them not save with truth; but most of them know not.

verses.text_ar: إِنَّ يَوْمَ ٱلْفَصْلِ مِيقَـٰتُهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Assuredly the Day of Decision is the term for all of them,

verses.text_ar: يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِى مَوْلًى عَن مَّوْلًى شَيْـًٔا وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: A day when friend can in naught avail friend, nor can they be helped,

verses.text_ar: إِلَّا مَن رَّحِمَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Save him on whom Allah hath mercy. Lo! He is the Mighty, the Merciful.

verses.text_ar: إِنَّ شَجَرَتَ ٱلزَّقُّومِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! the tree of Zaqqum,

verses.text_ar: طَعَامُ ٱلْأَثِيمِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: The food of the sinner!

verses.text_ar: كَٱلْمُهْلِ يَغْلِى فِى ٱلْبُطُونِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Like molten brass, it seetheth in their bellies

verses.text_ar: كَغَلْىِ ٱلْحَمِيمِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: As the seething of boiling water.

verses.text_ar: خُذُوهُ فَٱعْتِلُوهُ إِلَىٰ سَوَآءِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: (And it will be said): Take him and drag him to the midst of hell,

verses.text_ar: ثُمَّ صُبُّوا۟ فَوْقَ رَأْسِهِۦ مِنْ عَذَابِ ٱلْحَمِيمِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Then pour upon his head the torment of boiling water.

verses.text_ar: ذُقْ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْكَرِيمُ
verses.text_en_pickthall: (Saying): Taste! Lo! thou wast forsooth the mighty, the noble!

verses.text_ar: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَمْتَرُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! this is that whereof ye used to doubt.

verses.text_ar: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى مَقَامٍ أَمِينٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! those who kept their duty will be in a place secured.

verses.text_ar: فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Amid gardens and watersprings,

verses.text_ar: يَلْبَسُونَ مِن سُندُسٍ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٍ مُّتَقَـٰبِلِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Attired in silk and silk embroidery, facing one another.

verses.text_ar: كَذَٰلِكَ وَزَوَّجْنَـٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Even so (it will be). And We shall wed them unto fair ones with wide, lovely eyes.

verses.text_ar: يَدْعُونَ فِيهَا بِكُلِّ فَـٰكِهَةٍ ءَامِنِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: They call therein for every fruit in safety.

verses.text_ar: لَا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا ٱلْمَوْتَ إِلَّا ٱلْمَوْتَةَ ٱلْأُولَىٰ ۖ وَوَقَىٰهُمْ عَذَابَ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: They taste not death therein, save the first death. And He hath saved them from the doom of hell,

verses.text_ar: فَضْلًا مِّن رَّبِّكَ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْفَوْزُ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
verses.text_en_pickthall: A bounty from thy Lord. That is the supreme triumph.

verses.text_ar: فَإِنَّمَا يَسَّرْنَـٰهُ بِلِسَانِكَ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And We have made (this Scripture) easy in thy language only that they may heed.

verses.text_ar: فَٱرْتَقِبْ إِنَّهُم مُّرْتَقِبُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Wait then (O Muhammad). Lo! they (too) are waiting.
